title: Dogs üêï
description: Owning a dog is a rewarding responsibility that involves providing training, exercise, healthcare, and a loving companionship.
sentences: Dogs are social animals that need regular interaction and exercise.
Early socialization and consistent training are key to a well-behaved dog.
Choose a breed that fits your lifestyle and living situation.
A high-quality, age-appropriate diet is essential for their health.
Dogs thrive on routine and clear boundaries.
dos: Take them for regular vet check-ups, vaccinations, and deworming.
Groom your dog regularly, including brushing, nail trimming, and baths.
donts: Don't leave a dog alone for very long periods.
Never leave a dog in a hot car.
Don't feed them toxic foods like chocolate, onions, or grapes.
Don't use physical punishment for discipline.
